trans-unit.source: [Supported in the .NET Framework 4.5.1 and later versions]
trans-unit.target: [Suporte somente no .NET Framework 4.5.1 e versões posteriores]

trans-unit.source: Specifies whether transaction flow across thread continuations is enabled for <see cref="T:System.Transactions.TransactionScope" />.
trans-unit.target: Especifica se o fluxo de transações em continuações de thread está habilitado para <see cref="T:System.Transactions.TransactionScope" />.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Transactions.TransactionScopeAsyncFlowOption> is configured in the <xref:System.Transactions.TransactionScope.%23ctor%2A> overloads that take a <xref:System.Transactions.TransactionScopeAsyncFlowOption> parameter.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Transactions.TransactionScopeAsyncFlowOption> é configurado no <xref:System.Transactions.TransactionScope.%23ctor%2A> sobrecargas que usam um <xref:System.Transactions.TransactionScopeAsyncFlowOption> parâmetro.

trans-unit.source: Suppress is the default setting if no <xref:System.Transactions.TransactionScopeAsyncFlowOption.Suppress> is specified.
trans-unit.target: Suprimir é a configuração padrão se nenhuma <xref:System.Transactions.TransactionScopeAsyncFlowOption.Suppress> for especificado.

trans-unit.source: Specifies that transaction flow across thread continuations is enabled.
trans-unit.target: Especifica que o fluxo de transações em continuações de thread está habilitado.

trans-unit.source: Specifies that transaction flow across thread continuations is suppressed.
trans-unit.target: Especifica que o fluxo de transações em continuações de thread está suprimido.

trans-unit.source: This is the default setting if no <xref:System.Transactions.TransactionScopeAsyncFlowOption> is specified in the <xref:System.Transactions.TransactionScope.%23ctor%2A> constructor.
trans-unit.target: Essa é a configuração padrão se nenhuma <xref:System.Transactions.TransactionScopeAsyncFlowOption> é especificado no <xref:System.Transactions.TransactionScope.%23ctor%2A> construtor.
